QuestData.Title: Got Silk?
QuestData.Description: Strange noises comin' from over at the Silken Fields.$b$bStrange smells, too.$b$bAlmost makes you think that they could use a cash-strapped $c to complete a few odd jobs for 'em. Make a few pieces of gold.$b$bOr not.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Silkmaster Tsai at the Silken Fields in Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: Greetings, $c. Welcome to the Silken Fields.
